tuningTable.name: StudyIdDatasetId
tuningTable.sql: create table StudyIdDatsetId&1 as SELECT s.STABLE_ID STUDY_STABLE_ID, dp.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID DATASET_ID FROM EDA.STUDY s LEFT JOIN sres.EXTERNALDATABASERELEASE e ON s.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID =e.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID LEFT JOIN sres.EXTERNALDATABASE e2 ON e.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID =e2.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_ID LEFT JOIN apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dp on e2.name=dp.name
